好.definition: to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to

好了傷疤忘了疼.pinyin: hao3 le5 shang1 ba1 wang4 le5 teng2
好了傷疤忘了疼.definition: to forget past pains once the wound has healed (idiom)

好了瘡疤忘了痛.pinyin: hao3 le5 chuang1 ba1 wang4 le5 tong4
好了瘡疤忘了痛.definition: see 好了傷疤忘了疼|好了伤疤忘了疼[hao3 le5 shang1 ba1 wang4 le5 teng2]

好事不出門，惡事傳千里.pinyin: hao3 shi4 bu4 chu1 men2 , e4 shi4 chuan2 qian1 li3
好事不出門，惡事傳千里.definition: lit. good deeds do not go beyond the door, evil deeds spread a thousand miles; a good deed goes unnoticed, but scandal spreads fast (idiom)

好事多磨.definition: the road to happiness is strewn with setbacks (idiom)

好些.definition: a good deal of; quite a lot

好人.definition: good person; healthy person; person who tries not to offend anyone, even at the expense of principle

好使.definition: easy to use; to function well; so that; in order to

好借好還，再借不難.pinyin: hao3 jie4 hao3 huan2 , zai4 jie4 bu4 nan2
好借好還，再借不難.definition: see 有借有還，再借不難|有借有还，再借不难[you3 jie4 you3 huan2 , zai4 jie4 bu4 nan2]

好兵帥克.definition: The Good Soldier Švejk (Schweik), satirical novel by Czech author Jaroslav Hašek (1883-1923)

好友.definition: close friend; pal; (social networking website) friend; CL:個|个[ge4]

好受.definition: feeling better; to be more at ease

好吃.definition: to be fond of eating; to be gluttonous

好吃懶做.definition: happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom); all take and no give

好壞.definition: good or bad; good and bad; standard; quality; (coll.) very bad

好多.definition: many; quite a lot; much better

好夢難成.definition: a beautiful dream is hard to realize (idiom)

好大喜功.definition: to rejoice in grandiose deeds; to strive to achieve extraordinary things

好奇尚異.definition: to have a taste for the exotic (idiom)

好好先生.definition: Mr Goody-goody; yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)

好好兒.definition: in good condition; perfectly good; carefully; well; thoroughly

好好學習，天天向上.pinyin: hao3 hao3 xue2 xi2 , tian1 tian1 xiang4 shang4
好好學習，天天向上.definition: study hard and every day you will improve (idiom)

好學近乎知，力行近乎仁，知恥近乎勇.pinyin: hao4 xue2 jin4 hu1 zhi1 , li4 xing2 jin4 hu1 ren2 , zhi1 chi3 jin4 hu1 yong3
好學近乎知，力行近乎仁，知恥近乎勇.definition: to love learning is akin to knowledge, to study diligently is akin to benevolence, to know shame is akin to courage (Confucius)

好客.definition: hospitality; to treat guests well; to enjoy having guests; hospitable; friendly

好容易.definition: (idiomatic usage) with great difficulty; to have a hard time (convincing sb, relinquishing sth etc); (literal usage) so easy

好康.definition: (Tw) benefit; advantage (from Taiwanese 好空, Tai-lo pr. [hó-khang])

好心倒做了驢肝肺.pinyin: hao3 xin1 dao4 zuo4 le5 lu:2 gan1 fei4
好心倒做了驢肝肺.definition: (idiom) to mistake good intentions for ill will

好惡.definition: lit. likes and dislikes; preferences; taste

好意思.definition: to have the nerve; what a cheek!; to feel no shame; to overcome the shame; (is it) proper? (rhetorical question)

好戲還在後頭.pinyin: hao3 xi4 hai2 zai4 hou4 tou5
好戲還在後頭.definition: the best part of the show is yet to come; (with ironic tone) the worst is yet to come; you ain't seen nothin' yet

好整以暇.definition: to be calm and unruffled in the midst of chaos or at a busy time (idiom)

好料.definition: sth of good quality; good person (usu. in the negative); (Tw) delicious food

好日子.definition: auspicious day; good day; happy life

好景不長.definition: a good thing doesn't last forever (idiom)

好朋友.definition: good friend; (slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)

好樣的.definition: (idiom) a good person, used to praise sb's moral integrity or courage

好歹.definition: good and bad; most unfortunate occurrence; in any case; whatever

好死不如賴活著.pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5
好死不如賴活著.definition: better a bad life than a good death (idiom)

好比.definition: to be just like; can be compared to

好氣.definition: (coll.) good mood (usu. used in the negative); angry (usu. used in combination with 好笑[hao3xiao4])

好氣又好笑.definition: see 又好氣又好笑|又好气又好笑[you4 hao3qi4 you4 hao3xiao4]

好漢.definition: hero; strong and courageous person; CL:條|条[tiao2]

好漢不吃眼前虧.pinyin: hao3 han4 bu4 chi1 yan3 qian2 kui1
好漢不吃眼前虧.definition: a wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him (idiom)

好漢不提當年勇.pinyin: hao3 han4 bu4 ti2 dang1 nian2 yong3
好漢不提當年勇.definition: a real man doesn't boast about his past achievements (idiom)

好漢做事好漢當.pinyin: hao3 han4 zuo4 shi4 hao3 han4 dang1
好漢做事好漢當.definition: daring to act and courageous enough to take responsibility for it (idiom); a true man has the courage to accept the consequences of his actions; the buck stops here

好玩.definition: to be playful; to be fond of one's fun

好玩兒.definition: erhua variant of 好玩[hao3 wan2]

好球.definition: (ball sports) good shot!; nice hit!; well played!

好用.definition: useful; serviceable; effective; handy; easy to use

好男不跟女鬥.pinyin: hao3 nan2 bu4 gen1 nu:3 dou4
好男不跟女鬥.definition: a real man doesn't fight with womenfolk (idiom)

好看.definition: good-looking; nice-looking; (of a movie, book, TV show etc) good; in an embarrassing situation

好立克.definition: Horlicks (malt-flavored powder used to make a hot drink)

好端端.definition: perfectly all right; without rhyme or reason

好聚好散.definition: (idiom) to part without hard feelings; to cut the knot as smoothly as you tied it

好自為之.definition: to do one's best; to shape up; to fend for oneself; you're on your own

好色.definition: to want sex; given to lust; lecherous; lascivious; horny

好處.definition: benefit; advantage; merit; gain; profit; also pr. [hao3chu4]

好記性不如爛筆頭.pinyin: hao3 ji4 xing4 bu4 ru2 lan4 bi3 tou2
好記性不如爛筆頭.definition: the palest ink is better than the best memory (idiom)

好話.definition: friendly advice; words spoken on sb's behalf; a good word; kind words; words that sound fine but are not followed up with actions

好說.definition: easy to deal with; not a problem; (polite answer) you flatter me

好說歹說.definition: (idiom) to try one's very best to persuade sb; to reason with sb in every way possible

好象.definition: to seem; to be like (variant of 好像[hao3 xiang4])

好起來.definition: to get better; to improve; to get well

好轉.definition: to improve; to take a turn for the better; improvement

好辦.definition: easy to do; easy to manage

好逸惡勞.definition: to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)

好過.definition: to have an easy time; (feel) well

好道.definition: don't tell me ...; could it be that...?

好酒沉甕底.definition: lit. the best wine is at the bottom of the jug (idiom); fig. the best is saved for last

好險.definition: to have a close call; to have a narrow escape

好飯不怕晚.definition: the meal is remembered long after the wait is forgotten; the good things in life are worth waiting for

好馬不吃回頭草.pinyin: hao3 ma3 bu4 chi1 hui2 tou2 cao3
好馬不吃回頭草.definition: lit. a good horse doesn't turn around and graze the same patch again (idiom); fig. once you've moved on, don't go back again (romantic relationship, job etc); leave the past behind

好高騖遠.definition: to bite off more than one can chew (idiom); to aim too high

好鬥.definition: to be warlike; to be belligerent

好鳥.definition: person of good character; nice person; bird with a melodious voice or beautiful plumage
